decisions.decision: Use Stripe over Braintree for payment processing
decisions.reasoning: Better fraud detection, cleaner API, 2 weeks faster integration time
decisions.quote: Stripe's API is significantly cleaner. We'll save about 2 weeks on integration alone.

decisions.decision: Use Stripe's hosted checkout instead of custom checkout
decisions.reasoning: Faster to implement, PCI compliance handled by Stripe, better conversion rates
decisions.quote: Hosted checkout handles PCI for us. That's weeks of security work we don't have to do.

action_items.task: Get Legal approval for Stripe integration

updates.update: Meeting with Legal tomorrow morning to discuss Stripe contract terms

blockers.description: Legal pushed meeting to next week - they're swamped with another project
blockers.impact: Payment integration blocked until Legal approval
blockers.resolution_action: Sarah to escalate to Legal director

decisions.decision: Approved Stripe integration with standard vendor terms
decisions.quote: Standard terms are fine. I've reviewed Stripe's security posture - they're solid.

learnings.lesson: Book Legal reviews 2 weeks in advance
learnings.context: Legal approval took 8 days instead of expected 3 days

updates.update: Legal approved! Starting Stripe integration today. Should have basic checkout working by EOW.

summary.key_outcome: Stripe payment integration approved and implementation started
